The sample size was calculated using the following formula: n = (Z2 * p*q) / 2, where n is the sample size, Z is the confidence level (95%), p is the proportion of patients with a diagnosis of sarcoidosis in the control group (0.1), and q is the proportion of patients with a diagnosis of sarcoidosis in the intervention group (0.2). The study was approved by the institutional review board of the hospital.
